solution_line_template: Luisa drives a total of {miles_to_grocery} + {miles_to_mall} + {miles_to_pet_store} + {miles_back_home} = <<{miles_to_grocery}+{miles_to_mall}+{miles_to_pet_store}+{miles_back_home}={total_miles_driven}>>{total_miles_driven} miles
Luisa uses {total_miles_driven} / {miles_per_gallon} = <<{total_miles_driven}/{miles_per_gallon}={gallons_used}>>{gallons_used} gallons of gas for her trip
The total cost of the gas for Luisa's trip is {gallons_used} * ${cost_per_gallon} = $<<{gallons_used}*{cost_per_gallon}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
